response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. This product, while carrying an intrinsic worth of over $1,200,000 to us, represents a strategic asset that we believe would be an invaluable addition to your company's capabilities. We understand that the true value of this product may be unique to you, and thus, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to facilitate a mutually beneficial partnership. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your company's growth and success. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1100000}
